Exclusive: China presses Iran to rein in Houthi attacks in Red Sea, sources sayChinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:02:44 GMT V72J672MHRL2DLBVEDQ2YSLH5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/china-presses-iran-reigns-houthi-attacks-red-sea-sources-say-2024-01-26/Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley世界中东地区
Boeing production woes 'will get resolved' says major customer AvolonBoeing's production difficulties will "get resolved", its 737 MAX 10 aircraft will get certified and the impact of U.S. regulators freezing a planned production ramp-up will be minimal this year, the head of major customer Avolon said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:13:04 GMT XSBOHVPZHNAFOG3GCGEGNUZPI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeing-product-woes-will-be-resolved-says-major-customer-avolon-2024-01-26/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Global economy outlook at odds with aggressive rate cut betsGlobal growth is set to stay resilient this year and only pick up pace a bit in 2025, according to a Reuters poll of economists, a stable outlook at odds with still-relatively aggressive interest rate cut bets in financial markets. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:10:50 GMT XBODVAFSI5I3FAOPMZLC26SD5M https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-economy-outlook-odds-with-aggressive-rate-cut-bets-2024-01-26/Hari Kishan市场宏观问题
Morning Bid: Global cheer lifts that Friday feelingA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 21:49:35 GMT ISUA4HBGVJK43GA6RIP33RZRQU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-2024-01-25/Jamie McGeever市场
Chinese music student convicted in US of threatening pro-democracy activistA Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:36:00 GMT 7WTLPJMDSVIBJBWIBYFOHCQB7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/us/chinese-music-student-convicted-of-throne-us-pro-democracy-activist-2024-01-25/Nate Raymond世界美国
Yastremska happy to avoid qualifiers after Australian Open run endsDayana Yastremska did not feel too dejected by her semi-final defeat at the Australian Open as she knows her run would have boosted her rankings so that she can get direct entry into tournaments rather than playing in the qualifiers. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:34:10 GMT UFVTO7WJPZJPPHM5DRV7H73NAE https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/yastremska-happy-avoid-qualifiers-after-australian-open-run-ends-2024-01-25/Reuters运动的网球
